{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "descr": {
      "description": "The descriptive name for this certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "refid": {
      "description": "The unique ID assigned to this certificate authority for internal system use. This value is generated by this system and cannot be changed.<br>",
      "nullable": true,
      "readOnly": true,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "default": "6838b298a2ccf",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "trust": {
      "description": "Adds or removes this certificate authority from the operating system's trust stored.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "boolean"
    },
    "randomserial": {
      "description": "Enables or disables the randomization of serial numbers for certificates signed by this CA.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "boolean"
    },
    "serial": {
      "description": "The decimal number to be used as a sequential serial number for the next certificate to be signed by this CA. This value is ignored when Randomize Serial is checked.<br>",
      "nullable": true,
      "readOnly": true,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "default": 1,
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 99999999999999
    },
    "is_intermediate": {
      "description": "Indicates if this certificate authority is an intermediate certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "boolean"
    },
    "caref": {
      "description": "The certificate authority to use as the parent for this intermediate certificate authority.<br><br>This field is only available when the following conditions are met:<br>- `is_intermediate` must be equal to `true`<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string"
    },
    "keytype": {
      "description": "The type of key pair to generate.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "RSA",
        "ECDSA"
      ],
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "keylen": {
      "description": "The length of the RSA key pair to generate.<br><br>This field is only available when the following conditions are met:<br>- `keytype` must be equal to `'RSA'`<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "integer",
      "enum": [
        1024,
        2048,
        3072,
        4096,
        6144,
        7680,
        8192,
        15360,
        16384
      ],
      "minimum": 0,
      "maximum": 99999999999999
    },
    "ecname": {
      "description": "The name of the elliptic curve to use for the ECDSA key pair.<br><br>This field is only available when the following conditions are met:<br>- `keytype` must be equal to `'ECDSA'`<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "digest_alg": {
      "description": "The digest algorithm to use when signing certificates.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "lifetime": {
      "description": "The number of days the certificate authority is valid for.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "default": 3650,
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 1,
      "maximum": 12000
    },
    "dn_commonname": {
      "description": "The common name for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "default": "internal-ca",
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "dn_country": {
      "description": "The country for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "dn_state": {
      "description": "The state for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "dn_city": {
      "description": "The city for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "dn_organization": {
      "description": "The organization for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "dn_organizationalunit": {
      "description": "The organizational unit for the certificate authority.<br>",
      "nullable": false,
      "readOnly": false,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string",
      "minLength": 0,
      "maxLength": 1024
    },
    "crt": {
      "description": "The X509 certificate string.<br>",
      "nullable": true,
      "readOnly": true,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string"
    },
    "prv": {
      "description": "The X509 private key string.<br>",
      "nullable": true,
      "readOnly": true,
      "writeOnly": false,
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
